body:
Hi,

I tried to create a HBZone from multiple (child-)surfaces without floors and ceiling. Even if I flatten the HBSurfaces, I don't get any closed brep out from HBZones.

Thanks in advance,

D
topic: child surfaces - flatten - HBZone - no closed brep

replies.body:
Hi all,

problem solved, brep collection weren't flattened...

D
